title: Day 1
message:
**Arrays and Accessing Arrays**

var array = \[ elementOne, elementTwo, elementThree...\]

accessing
array\[anyElement\]

.push - add on the end of an array

bracket notation can be used to access elements in arrays and also characters in strings

.length - gives the total elements of an array or the characters of a string.

length - 1 accesses the last element of the array

you can add any data types to an array

you have to use comments to separate elements.
